name: status-component-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Status Component Library and its playgrounds.

scripts.clean: pnpm --filter status-component-vue2 run clean-core && pnpm --filter status-component-vue3 run clean-core
scripts.test:build: pnpm run build && echo 'Build test completed successfully'
scripts.test:pack: cd packages/status-component-vue2 && npm pack --dry-run && cd ../status-component-vue3 && npm pack --dry-run
scripts.version:patch: cd packages/status-component-vue2 && npm version patch && cd ../status-component-vue3 && npm version patch
scripts.version:minor: cd packages/status-component-vue2 && npm version minor && cd ../status-component-vue3 && npm version minor
scripts.version:major: cd packages/status-component-vue2 && npm version major && cd ../status-component-vue3 && npm version major
scripts.release: cd packages/status-component-vue2 && npm publish && cd ../status-component-vue3 && npm publish
scripts.release:dry: cd packages/status-component-vue2 && npm publish --dry-run && cd ../status-component-vue3 && npm publish --dry-run
